00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h> 
00040 
00041 #include "CmdCopy.h"
00042 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00043 #include "SceneModel.h"
00044 #include "Trace.h"
00045 
00046 
00047 CmdCopy::CmdCopy( const QModelIndex& index, SoNode*& clipboard, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent)
00048 : QUndoCommand("Copy", parent), m_pClipboard ( clipboard ), m_pNode( 0 ),m_previousNode ( 0 ), m_pModel( model)
00049 {
00050         Trace( "CmdCopy::CmdCopy", false );
00051         
00052         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
00053         m_pNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00054         
00055         m_previousNode = clipboard ;
00056 }
00057 
00058 CmdCopy::~CmdCopy()
00059 {
00060         Trace( "CmdCopy::~CmdCopy", false );
00061 }
00062 
00063 void CmdCopy::undo()
00064 {
00065         Trace( "CmdCopy::undo", false );
00066         
00067         m_pClipboard = m_previousNode;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void CmdCopy::redo( )
00071 {
00072         Trace( "CmdCopy::redo", false );
00073         
00074         m_pClipboard  = m_pNode;
00075 }
